TEXT.TITLE: BIONOMIC SCIENCES INTERNATIONAL INC <BSII> LOSS
TEXT.BODY: 2nd qtr Jan 31 end Shr loss three cts vs loss nine cts Net loss 112,400 vs loss 275,400 Sales 318,100 vs 23,600 Avg shrs 4,294,300 vs 3,028,326 1st half Shr profit four cts vs loss 14 cts Net profit 165,600 vs loss 409,100 Sales 546,600 vs 44,400 Avg shrs 4,189,700 vs 3,028,326 NOTE: Current year net includes gains on sale of assets of 25,000 dlrs in quarter and 396,000 dlrs in half. Net includes extraordinary loss 10,000 dlrs vs nil in quarter and loss 10,000 dlrs vs profit 106,300 dlrs in half. Reuter
